sections.title: Meta Data (the document formerly known as Transmittal Sheet)

items.label: Financial Institution Name.
items.description: Enter the name of the financial institution that is reporting HMDA.

items.label: Financial Institution Address.
items.description: Enter the address of the headquarters in the format described by the U.S. Postal Service Addressing Standards.

parts.label: Street Address.
parts.description: Enter the street address of the headquarters in the fomat described by the U.S. Postal Service Addressing Standards.

parts.label: City Name.
parts.description: Enter the name of the city.

parts.label: State Code.
parts.description: Enter the two letter State code for the applicable State, using the U.S. Postal Service official State abbreviations.

sections.label: Activity Year.
sections.description: Enter the year that the activity covers in the loan application register by year using numerals in the form YYYY.

sections.label: Activty Calendar Quarter.
sections.description: Enter the calendar quarter that the activity covers in the loan application register using the applicable alpha numeric code from the following:

codes.description: Activity occurring during the period between January 1st (01/01) and March 31st  (03/31).
Activity occurring during the period between April 1st (04/01) and June 30th (06/30).
Activity occurring during the period between July 1st (07/01) and September 30th (09/30).

notes.description: Activity occurring during the period between October 1st (10/01) and December 31st (12/31) will be submitted along with the annual submission. Financial institutions should not submit a separate loan/application register for the fourth calendar quarter.

items.label: Contact Information.
items.description: Enter the name and contact information of a person who may be contacted with questions about the institution’s submission.

parts.label: Contact Name.
parts.description: Enter the name of the person who may be contacted with questions about the institution's submission.

parts.label: Contact Phone Number.
parts.description: Enter the phone number of the person who may be contacted with questions about the institution's submission.

parts.label: Contact E-mail Address.
parts.description: Enter the e-mail address of the person who may be contacted with questions about the institution's submission.

items.label: Federal Agency.
items.description: Enter the institution's appropriate Federal agency by entering the applicable Code from the following:

items.label: Number of Entries.
items.description: Enter the total number of entries contained in the submission in numeral form.

items.label: Federal Taxpayer Identification Number.
items.description: Enter the financial institution’s Federal Taxpayer Identification Number.

items.label: Parent Company.
items.description: Enter the name of the financial institution’s parent company.  Enter “NA” if there is no parent company.

items.label: Legal Entity Identifier (LEI).
items.description: Enter the LEI of the financial institution.

notes.description: Issued by a utility endorsed by the LEI Regulatory Oversight Committee; or
Issued by a utility endorsed or otherwise governed by the Global LEI Foundation (GLEIF) (or any successor of the GLEIF) after the GLEIF assumes operational governance of the global LEI system.
